00022 #ifndef _APT_H_
00023 #define _APT_H_
00024 
00025 #ifdef WIN32
00026 #ifdef APT_LIB_EXPORTS // when building DLL, target project defines this macro
00027 #define APTLIB_API __declspec(dllexport)
00028 #elif defined(APT_LIB_IMPORTS) // when using DLL, client project defines this macro
00029 #define APTLIB_API __declspec(dllimport)
00030 #else // when building or using target static library, or whatever: define it as nothing
00031 #define APTLIB_API
00032 #endif // APT_EXPORT
00033 #else
00034 #define APTLIB_API
00035 #endif // WIN32
00036 
00037 #endif /* _APT_H_ */
